channel.title: Hyperion Compiler
channel.description:
Has anyone got the code for a hyperion compiler i could have please, Im in urgent need of it and cant find it anywhere.
Thanks post below.

item.title: Hyperion Compiler
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This is your Third post on this. I’m reporting.
10+ people have told you
USE AN IDE

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Compiler
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

@echo off :sha "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp lib/jython.jar;lib/xstream.jar;lib/xpp.jar;lib/slf4j-api-1.5.8.jar;lib/mina-core-2.0.0-M6.jar;lib/slf4j-jdk14-1.5.8.jar;lib/commons-compress-1.0.jar;lib/junit-4.6.jar -d bin src/org/hyperion/*.java src/org/hyperion/data/*.java src/org/hyperion/fileserver/*.java src/org/hyperion/ls/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/map/*.java src/org/hyperion/cache/index/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/container/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/region/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/ondemand/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/impl/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/util/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/task/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/packet/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/net/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/model/*.java src/org/hyperion/util/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/login/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/event/*.java src/org/hyperion/rs2/action/*.java pause goto sha

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Compiler
item.dc:creator: @FrogPk_Developer FrogPk Developer
item.description:
@FrogPk_Developer wrote:

Dude, ive tryed typing out one but it says cannot find src\org\hyperion*.java for some reason, im using lumbridge hypeion 525 and i need compiler and the client wont run either.

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Compiler
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Flame_:

Use an IDE instead; it auto-compiles for you and shows you exactly where your errors are.

Probably your best bet if you don’t even somewhat understand what a batch file does.

Just look at any other server’s batch for compilation, and make sense of how it works, then type your own out for you server.

Read full topic
